column5: hey there. been going to Ignace ,Ontario fishing at arethusa and flat rock for past 14 yrs and it seems like fishing has slowed down and fishing pressure.is down to a few boats per week.years ago it was hard to find a parking spot at arethusa.is there better fishing up the road.really like the area for camping on the islands. any info would be .
I thought Kukukus was pretty spectacular when I fished there 3 seasons ago. Lots of pike, bass, and walleye. It was huge fun and some great specimens too.
